description: [DW] While Russia has a long historical relationship with many African nations, Ukraine is virtually starting from scratch.
title: Africa: How Ukraine Is Trying to Combat Russia's Influence in Africa

description: [The Herald] Dr Norman Pinduka -- The world last week celebrated the World Refugee Day. The day is celebrated on June 20 every year.
title: Africa: Community Essential for Inclusion, Participation of Refugees in Africa

description: [Ethiopian Herald] There is an urgent demand for Africa to have its own media for the purpose of face negotiation, rebranding itself and connecting Africa together in all core endeavors of the spirit and dimensions of Africanism. It's a high time for Africa to take an inward looking perspective for prosperity and voicing dealing with African issues in African way, according to sources.
title: Africa: A Pan-African Media to Reshape the Continent's Global Image

description: [African Union] H.E Damtien Larbli Tchintchibidja, Vice President, ECOWAS,
title: Africa: Goodwill Message By Dr. Alhaji Sarjoh Bah, Director of Conflict Management Directorate, to the 28th Technical Meeting Between the AUC and the Regional Economic Communities (Recs) On Early Warning, Abuja, 24 - 26 June 2024

description: [Premium Times] The UN Women says electing and appointing women in leadership positions signals strong political will for gender equality and demonstrates a collective commitment to tackling the challenges the world faces today.
title: Africa: 113 Countries Yet to Have Woman Head of State, Says UN Women

description: [Africom] Stuttgart, Germany -- Defense leaders from dozens of African nations will meet beginning tomorrow as part of the 2024 Africa Chiefs of Defense Conference in Botswana.
title: Africa: Africa Defense Chiefs, U.S. Slated to Meet Tomorrow in Botswana

description: [Daily Trust] The recent "AI for Community Impact Summit" organised by Microsoft in Johannesburg, South Africa, buzzed with excitement. As a participant, I was particularly thrilled to witness the launch of a groundbreaking white paper: "AI and the Future of Work in Africa." This insightful document co-authored by a diverse group of thought leaders explores the potential impact of generative AI on the African workforce.
title: Africa: 7 Key Takeaways From the 'Ai and the Future of Work in Africa' White Paper

description: [Business Day Africa] Efforts to cut carbon dioxide emissions in the aviation industry by using sustainable fuel face significant challenges, primarily due to high costs and market uncertainties deterring producers.
title: Africa: Aviation Emission Reduction Efforts Face High Costs, Production Hurdles

description: [Accra Times] Google Africa has apologized for a controversial tweet that attempted to humorously compare Africa's passion for football to "hide-and-seek with lions".
title: Africa: Google Africa Apologizes for Offensive Tweet

description: [ACSS] Legislatures play an integral role in advancing national security by ensuring priorities align with citizen interests, budgets are allocated to meet priorities, and adequate oversight exists for the effective use of these resources.
title: Africa: How Africa's Legislatures Can Improve Security

description: [OCHA] Joint Statement by Principals of the UN Steering Group on Solutions to Internal Displacement: IOM, OCHA, UNDP, UNDPO, UNDPPA, UNICEF and UNHCR
title: Africa: Two-Year Anniversary of the UN Secretary-General's Action Agenda On Internal Displacement

description: [UN News] A total of 53 countries had best practice policies in place for tackling industrial trans fats in food as of last year, vastly improving the food environment for 3.7 billion people, or 46 per cent of the world's population, according to a milestone report published by the UN World Health Organization on Monday.
title: Africa: Half the World Now Following Doctors' Orders On Cutting Trans Fats - WHO
